tursodatabase/turso-client-php.summary: The repository has seen recent activities including the addition of ts and nts build support, introduction of a version script, and an updated version. A pull request was also merged which added NTS and TS support with CI related changes, resolving issue #6. The changes do not introduce a breaking change.

tursodatabase/limbo.summary: Recent activities include push events focusing on no allocation for serial types, indicating efforts to optimize memory usage within the repository's codebase.

tursodatabase/libsql-php.summary: A recent push event refactored and fixed code by moving ffi checks and adding defaults to PDO options, showcasing ongoing development and refinement of the repository.

tursodatabase/turso-cli.summary: A pull request was submitted to update the usage of endpoints for query statistics, shifting from the obsolete /stats endpoint to the modern /usage/queries endpoint, enhancing the tool's functionality and compatibility, especially for databases in AWS.
